mapper.insert: insert into reply_board(no, userid, coment) values(#{no}, #{userid}, #{coment})
mapper.select: select reply_no, no, userid, coment, writedate from reply_board where no=${param1} order by reply_no asc
mapper.update: update reply_board set coment=#{coment} where reply_no=${reply_no} and userid=#{userid}
mapper.delete: delete from reply_board where reply_no=${param1} and userid=#{param2}
